summary.span: 您可以使用此方法，以回應惡意 HTTP 用戶端攻擊。

span.span: You might use this method in response to an attack by a malicious HTTP client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是安全執行緒。This method is thread-safe. 任何執行緒可以呼叫它在任何時間。Any thread may call it at any time. 這個方法只用於整合模式。This method can only be used in integrated mode. 如果您叫用它以傳統模式，則會擲回例外狀況。If you invoke it in classic mode, an exception is thrown. 若要判斷管線模式，請使用。To determine the pipeline mode, use .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnonymousID As String
public: property System::String ^ AnonymousID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得使用者的匿名識別項 (如果有)。

span.span: Gets the anonymous identifier for the user, if present.

value.span: 表示目前匿名使用者識別項的字串。

span.span: A string representing the current anonymous user identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性將長時間執行的唯一識別項指派給未驗證的使用者，這可以用於追蹤使用者或指派給該使用者的設定檔屬性，而不將資料儲存於`Session`物件。The property assigns a long-lived unique identifier to a non-authenticated user, which can be used to track the user or assign profile properties to that user without storing data in a `Session` object. 根據預設， cookie 追蹤屬性，但它可以設定為使用 URI 時的匿名識別組態區段中的屬性會設為， ，或值。By default, the property is tracked using a cookie, but it can be set to use the URI when the attribute in the anonymous identification configuration section is set to either the , , or value. 如果您不再想要使用，例如當匿名使用者通過驗證，您必須明確清除 cookie。You must explicitly clear the cookie if you no longer want it available, for example when an anonymous user is authenticated. 需要識別的實體，未通過驗證時，需要授權時，會使用匿名識別。Anonymous identification is used when there is a need to identify entities that are not authenticated and when authorization is required. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[anonymousIdentification 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929)For more information, see [anonymousIdentification Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2bd927ef-9057-4703-9c55-4cfb6d7d0929) ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，方法是處理Global.asax 檔案中的事件。The following example shows how to use the property by handling the event in the Global.asax file. 這個範例有兩個部分：This example has two parts: - 處理 Global.asax 檔案中的方法事件。A method in the Global.asax file that handles the event. - Web Form 網頁。A Web Forms page. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，方法是處理Global.asax 檔案中的事件。The first part of the code example shows how to set the property by handling the event in the Global.asax file. 名為方法`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`設定匿名的識別碼建立時的屬性。The method that is named `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` sets the property when an anonymous ID is created. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/CS/global_asax.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/vb/global_asax.vb#2)] 第二個部分的程式碼範例示範如何顯示新，它由`AnonymousIdentification_Creating`在上述範例中的事件處理常式。The second part of the code example shows how to display the new that is created by the `AnonymousIdentification_Creating` event handler in the preceding example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/CS/anonid_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_AnonymousID/vb/anonid_vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationPath As String
public: property System::String ^ ApplicationPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ASP.NET 應用程式在伺服器上的虛擬應用程式根路徑。

span.span: Gets the ASP.NET application's virtual application root path on the server.

value.span: 目前應用程式的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來建構從頁面或 Web 使用者控制項不在根目錄中的應用程式根目錄的相對 URL。Use this property to construct a URL relative to the application root from a page or Web user control that is not in the root directory. 這可讓網頁及共用存在使用相同的程式碼來連結至資源在應用程式中的固定位置的目錄結構的不同層級的控制項。This allows pages and shared controls that exist at different levels of a directory structure to use the same code to link to resources at fixed locations in the application. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將 HTML 編碼，然後寫入的值文字檔案的屬性。The following example uses the method to HTML-encode and then write the value of the property to a text file. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. 它假設存在名為物件`sw`。It assumes the existence of a object named `sw`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1/CS/requestdetailscs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Sample1/VB/requestdetailsvb.aspx#2)] 下列範例會使用來以程式設計方式建構應用程式中的固定位置中的資源路徑的屬性。The following example uses the property to programmatically construct a path to a resource that is in a fixed location in the application. 要在與資源相同的目錄中尋找沒有參考之資源的網頁。The page that references the resource does not have to be located in the same directory as the resource. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/CS/ApplicationPath.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/VB/ApplicationPath.aspx#2)] 如果您執行此範例中名為 WebSite1，Web 應用程式中`/WebSite1`將顯示的值為屬性和`/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif`將會顯示為映像的完整路徑。If you run this example in a Web application that is named WebSite1, `/WebSite1` will be displayed as the value of the property and `/WebSite1/images/Image1.gif` will be displayed as the complete path of the image.

summary.span: 取得應用程式根目錄的虛擬路徑，並對應用程式根目錄使用波狀符號 (~) 標記法，讓此路徑變成相對路徑 (就像是 "~/page.aspx")。

span.span: Gets the virtual path of the application root and makes it relative by using the tilde (~) notation for the application root (as in "~/page.aspx").

value.span: 目前要求的應用程式根目錄之虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path of the application root for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來提供將保持不變即使應用程式會變更位置的 URL 資訊。Use this property to provide URL information that will stay the same even if the application changes location. 這可讓相同 URL 對應程式碼將用於測試環境中，並在最後一個部署環境中，或使用不同網域中的 Web 應用程式的複本。This allows the same URL-mapping code to be used in a test environment and in the final deployment environment, or to be used by copies of Web applications in different domains. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來設定的 URL頁面相同目錄中之影像的控制項。The following example uses the property to set the URL of an control to an image in the same directory as the page. 若要查看產生的目錄結構的不同層級執行此頁面屬性值。Run this page at different levels of a directory structure to see the resulting property values. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath/CS/AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPathCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPath/VB/AppRelativeCurrentExecutionPathVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例會使用屬性以程式設計方式設定路徑的資源，根據目前頁面的路徑。The following example uses the property to programmatically set the path to a resource, based on the current path of the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/CS/apprelativecurrentexecutionfilepath.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath/VB/apprelativecurrentexecutionfilepath.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Cookies As HttpCookieCollection

summary.span: 取得用戶端送出的 Cookie 的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of cookies sent by the client.

value.span: 物件，代表用戶端的 Cookie 變數。

span.span: An object representing the client's cookie variables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 包含兩個內建 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 透過集合集合包含用戶端中的伺服器傳送的 cookie`Cookie`標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 透過集合集合包含在伺服器上建立並傳送給用戶端的新 cookie`Set-Cookie`標頭。The collection accessed through the collection of contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. > [!NOTE] > 使用新增 cookie 之後集合，cookie 可立即用於集合，即使尚未傳送回應至用戶端。After you add a cookie by using the collection, the cookie is immediately available in the collection, even if the response has not been sent to the client. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會透過用戶端傳送的所有 cookie 執行迴圈，並傳送至 HTTP 輸出的名稱、 到期日、 安全性參數和每個 cookie 的值。The following code example loops through all cookies sent by the client and sends the name, expiration date, security parameter, and values of each cookie to the HTTP output. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpRequest.Cookies Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會提供替代屬性。This method provides an alternative to using the property. 之前它會傳回已收到整個要求等待屬性物件。The property waits until the whole request has been received before it returns a object. 相反地，方法會傳回立即物件。In contrast, the method returns the object immediately. 開始之前尚未收到完整內容主體的處理實體主體，您可以使用此方法。You can use the method to begin processing the entity body before the complete contents of the body have been received. 實體 （或最多為您的要求和已接收） 使用物件時，才會傳回透過呼叫方法，例如讀取資料流，此方法由方法。The entity body (or as much of it as you request and has been received) is returned only when you use the object that is returned by this method to read the stream, by calling methods such as the method. 使用參數方法，以指定要讀取的實體主體中有多少。You use parameters of the method to specify how much of the entity body to read. ASP.NET 的這個方法傳回的物件支援同步和非同步讀取的方法。The object returned by ASP.NET from this method supports both synchronous and asynchronous read methods. 物件同時實作和方法。The object implements both the and methods. 非同步方法可讓您以非同步方式讀取要求實體中的區塊，而 ASP.NET 釋放目前執行緒的非同步讀取迴圈的每個反覆項目之間。The asynchronous methods let you asynchronously read the request entity in chunks, while ASP.NET releases the current thread in between each iteration of an asynchronous read loop. 如果要求上傳大型檔案，而且您想要開始上傳完成之前先存取的檔案內容，則這個方法就很有用。This method can be useful if the request is uploading a large file and you want to begin accessing the file contents before the upload is finished. 不過，您應該只使用這個方法的情況下您要接管實體主體的所有處理。However, you should only use this method for scenarios where you want to take over all processing of the entity body. 這表示您無法使用這個方法從.aspx 頁面，因為.aspx 網頁執行時，實體內容已經讀取。This means that you cannot use this method from an .aspx page, because by the time an .aspx page runs, the entity body has already been read.

summary.span: 提供 IIS 方法的 Managed 包裝函式，這個方法會將 HTTP 要求實體本文插入記憶體中。

span.span: Provides a managed wrapper for the IIS method that inserts an HTTP request entity body into memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法多載提供受管理的存取 IIS 7`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法。The method overloads provide managed access to the IIS 7 `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method. IIS 方法會插入記憶體中的 HTTP 要求實體本文 （由用戶端張貼的資料）。The IIS method inserts an HTTP request entity body (the data that is posted by a client) into memory. 這是很有用，因為 IIS 不會維護一份要求實體之後已讀取。This is useful because IIS does not maintain a copy of the request entity after it has been read. 方法建立的 HTTP 要求實體資料複本，並將它提供給 IIS 的其他自訂處理。The methods create a copy of the HTTP request entity data and make it available to IIS for additional custom handling. > [!NOTE] > 方法多載只會在 IIS 7.0 或更新版本中，工作，因為`IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody`方法在 IIS 7.0 中所加入。The method overloads work only on IIS 7.0 or later, because the `IHttpRequest::InsertEntityBody` method was added in IIS 7.0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InsertEntityBody() cil managed

summary.span: 將 HTTP 要求實體本文的複本提供給 IIS。

span.span: Provides IIS with a copy of the HTTP request entity body.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IIS 不會維護一份要求之後已讀取。IIS does not maintain a copy of the request after it has been read. 因此，建議只在 HTTP 要求的處理常式應該讀取要求實體。Therefore, it is recommended that only the handler for an HTTP request should read the request entity. 方法多載要求實體的複本提供 IIS 它先前由 ASP.NET 所讀取。The method overload provides IIS with a copy of the request entity if it was previously read by ASP.NET. 這個方法多載可用於 ASP.NET 已讀取要求實體，而且您想要重複使用現有的要求資料。This method overload is useful for cases where ASP.NET has read the entity request and you want to reuse the existing request data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開的屬性和方法的目前連線使用者到 Microsoft 網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 的物件。The property exposes the properties and methods of the object for the currently connected user to Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS). 執行個體所公開的類別追蹤 IIS 要求語彙基元，並提供簡易存取此語彙基元 ASP.NET 內正在處理目前的 HTTP 要求。The instance of the class that is exposed by tracks the IIS request token and provides easy access to this token for the current HTTP request being processed inside of ASP.NET. 執行個體類別會自動建立，因此不需要為建構為了要能夠存取其方法和屬性。An instance of the class is automatically created so it does not need to be constructed to in order to gain access to its methods and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取寫出的文字檔案中的每個項目值與目前使用者的屬性。The following code example shows how to retrieve the property for the current user and write out the values of each item in a text file. 此程式碼置於表單的參考的 ASP.NET 頁面`ACTION`屬性。Place this code on the ASP.NET page referenced by the form's `ACTION` attribute. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 屬性可能包含機密資訊的裝載環境。The property potentially contains sensitive information about the hosting environment. 傳回值不應該顯示給使用者。The return value should not be displayed to users. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以在伺服器上的完整實體路徑轉換成虛擬路徑。The following code example uses the method to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path on the server. 這個範例有兩個部分：This example has two parts: - .Aspx 網頁的路徑對應，讀取檔案，並顯示讀取作業的結果。An .aspx page maps the path, reads the file, and displays results of the read operation. - 一種類別， `UpperCaseFilterStream`，變更為大寫傳遞的所有字元。A class, `UpperCaseFilterStream`, that changes all characters passed through it to uppercase. 此範例的第一個部分會示範如何將轉換為完整實體路徑使用的虛擬路徑方法。The first part of the example shows how to convert a virtual path to a fully qualified physical path using the method. 此實體的路徑會接著傳遞給物件，取得檔案的內容。This physical path is then passed to a object, which obtains the contents of the file. 方法接著會呼叫顯示在頁面上的檔案內容。The method is then called to display the content of the file on the page. 屬性用來將篩選附加至回應資料流，讓 [全部大寫] 頁面上所顯示的文字。The property is used to attach a filter to the response stream that makes the text displayed to the page all uppercase. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2/CS/requestsamples2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpRequest_Samples2/VB/requestsamples2vb.aspx#1)] 此範例的第二個部分示範繼承自一個類別，並將資料流中的所有字元都轉換成大寫。The second part of the example shows a class that inherits from and converts all characters in a stream to uppercase. 將此程式碼置於`App_Code`應用程式資料夾。Put this code in the `App_Code` folder for your application. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩種方式可取得名為"fullname"的查詢字串變數的值。The following code example shows two ways to get the value of a query string variable named "fullname". 在每個案例中，如果 URL 為`http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`，則傳回的值是"Fadi Fakhouri"，因為`%20`是 URL 解碼為空格字元。In each case, if the URL is `http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx?fullname=Fadi%20Fakhouri`, then the value returned is "Fadi Fakhouri" because the `%20` is URL-decoded into a space character. 如果 URL 不需要`fullname`查詢字串 ID，傳回的值會是`null`。If the URL doesn’t have a `fullname` query string ID, the returned value would be `null`. 第一行程式碼會尋找索引鍵"fullname"只有在查詢字串;第二行中尋找"fullname"中的所有 HTTP 要求集合的索引鍵。The first line of code looks for the key "fullname" only in the query string; the second line looks for the key "fullname" in all of the HTTP request collections. 如需第二行的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the second line, see . ```csharp string fullname1 = Request.QueryString["fullname"]; string fullname2 = Request["fullname"]; ``` ```vb Dim fullname1 As String = Request.QueryString("fullname") Dim fullname2 As String = Request("fullname") ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimedOutToken As CancellationToken
public: property System::Threading::CancellationToken TimedOutToken { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

summary.span: 取得要求逾時所觸發的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object that is tripped when a request times out.

value.span: 取消語彙基元。

span.span: The cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在 Web.config 檔案中指定的逾時期限 (請參閱) 或以程式設計方式 (請參閱)。The timeout period can be specified in the Web.config file (see ) or programmatically (see ). 逾時期限是從要求進入時開始計算。The timeout period is measured from the time the request comes in. 如果實際上是 110 秒的預設逾時，將不得早於開始處理要求之後，110 秒內觸動的取消語彙基元。If the default timeout of 110 seconds is in effect, the cancellation token will be tripped no earlier than 110 seconds after request processing begins. 您可以變更屬性值，並會遵守尚未尚未達到長這個語彙基元，為新的逾時值。You can change the property value, and as long this token hasn't tripped yet, the new timeout value will be respected. 目前的語彙基元僅提供 15 的第二個資料粒度，這表示如果逾時值是 110 秒，語彙基元會達到一段時間之間 110 和 125 秒之後就會開始處理要求。Currently the token only provides 15 second granularity, which means that if the timeout value is 110 seconds, the token will be tripped sometime between 110 and 125 seconds after request processing begins. 資料粒度可能會在未來變更。The granularity may change in the future. 即使這個屬性是安全執行緒，有其限制。Even though this property is thread-safe, there are restrictions on its use. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 這個屬性是無意義，如果 Websocket 要求處理已開始。This property is meaningless if WebSockets request processing has started.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求驗證檢查 HTML 標記和指令碼，可能表示潛在的跨網站指令碼處理攻擊。Request validation checks for HTML markup and script that might indicate a potential cross-site scripting attack. 根據預設，所有的值會檢查使用要求驗證，而且如果任何值包含標記或指令碼，ASP.NET 會擲回例外狀況。By default, all values are checked using request validation and if any values contain markup or script, ASP.NET throws an exception. 使用這個方法，如果您預期的要求將會包含標記 （例如，您允許使用者張貼的內容，其中包含標記） 和您想要取得要求的原始值。Use this method if you anticipate that the request will contain markup (for example, you are allowing users to post content that contains markup) and you want to get the raw value of a request. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果您使用這個屬性時，您必須手動檢查潛在的跨網站指令碼攻擊的資料。If you use this property, you must manually check the data for potential cross-site scripting attacks.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取所傳回的多個值成字串陣列和每一種語言的名稱使其不同的 HTTP 輸出行寫入的屬性。The following code example captures the multiple values returned by the property into a string array and writes each language name to a separate line of HTTP output. 瀏覽器中，所提供的語言名稱，並沒有明確所有可能的程式碼清單。The language names are provided by the browser, and there is no definitive list of all possible codes. 通常這些含有兩個字元的代碼語言、 連字號和兩個字元的代碼，文化特性，例如 「 en-us-我們 「 美國地區英文和"fr-ca 」 為加拿大法文。Typically these consist of a two-character codes for the language, a hyphen, and a two-character code for the culture, such as "en-us" for U.S. English and "fr-ca" for Canadian French. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: 會對透過 、 和 屬性存取的集合進行驗證。

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別使用的輸入的驗證旗標來追蹤是否要透過存取的要求集合上執行驗證， ，和屬性。The class uses input validation flags to track whether to perform validation on the request collections accessed through the , , and properties. 方法設定這些旗標，因此，當的 get 存取子， ，或叫用屬性，則會執行輸入的驗證。The method sets these flags so that when the get accessors for the , , or property are invoked, input validation is performed. 驗證的運作方式是檢查所有的輸入的資料的硬式編碼有潛在危險的資料清單。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data. 如果頁面指示詞或組態來啟用驗證功能，在頁面的期間呼叫這個方法`ProcessRequest`處理階段。If the validation feature is enabled by page directive or configuration, this method is called during the page's `ProcessRequest` processing phase. 可以由您的程式碼呼叫方法，如果未啟用驗證功能。The method can be called by your code if the validation feature is not enabled.

exception.span: 連入用戶端的可能有危險的資料。

span.span: Potentially dangerous data was received from the client.
